channel.title: KaniBasami logged in as moparisthebest
channel.description:
http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=535365
Basically a note to myself, I logged onto the console to find this idiot logged in as me, did a whois to find the IP and link the accounts. He lied about it, but after I threatened to fully roll him back and ban him, he admitted it. Just watch and if you see me log in but not authenticate, let me know. I don't need some idiot trying to guess my password. (though he'd be lucky as hell to bruteforce it like that)
